meanings.definition: A substance used to color materials
meanings.sent1: The dyes in the art kit made the colors bright.
meanings.sent2: She bought different dyes to color her tie-dye shirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf accidentally spilled the dyes all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: His laughter dyes the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The dyes transformed the plain fabric into a rainbow masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To color with or as if with a dye
meanings.sent1: Mom dyes the eggs for Easter every year.
meanings.sent2: The artist dyes the fabric using a special technique.
meanings.sent3: The magician dyes the rabbit blue instead of pulling it out of a hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile dyes the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sunset dyes the sky with shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: To take on or impart color in dyeing
meanings.sent1: The white shirt dyes easily with the red dye.
meanings.sent2: The fabric dyes beautifully in the natural dye bath.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef accidentally dyes his apron green while cooking.
meanings.sent4: Her voice dyes the song with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The flower petals dyes the water in the vase with a lovely hue.
